name: Keys to Freedom
description:
This game is for the Play20 GameJam with the topic "Exploring Borders".

In Keys to Freedom, it's your job to help the Birb with your input devices like the keyboard. The game melts the borders between input device and game by using the device as an active element in the game!

Stuck at the beginning? There are two letters on screen. Maybe the green one is important..

Working keyboard and mouse needed!

Game by: Christian -Samb- Wasser, SunthornArts , Ben Zimmermann
